content.raw:
I just checked center of mass, collisions and visuals in Gazebo without any plugin running and looks good.

I compared the joint, contact and IMU names with the diagrams showed [here](http://gazebosim.org/haptix) and they don't match. Should we sync with the canonical source? (assuming are the diagrams in gazebosim.org/haptix page).
content.html:
I just checked center of mass, collisions and visuals in Gazebo without any plugin running and looks good.

I compared the joint, contact and IMU names with the diagrams showed here and they don't match. Should we sync with the canonical source? (assuming are the diagrams in gazebosim.org/haptix page).
